about_the_game:
Endragon - Test Branch

Endragon is an action RPG in which Mars, a former hero, and Luna, a modern-day sorceress, travel together to defeat a resurrected evil.

-Story-

Mars is a former hero who once saved the world. He was living a peaceful life. But then a giant evil revives and he loses his precious family.

He was at his wit's end. He ran away from home because he was tired of his elite education in medieval magic. Luna, a self-proclaimed modern magician, joins him.

The two set out on a journey to defeat a great evil, but...

-Features-

Royal action RPG with primitive swords, magic and dragons.
An exhilarating experience of unleashing god-speed swordplay and modern magic.
Training elements such as leveling up and acquiring weapons

We will be releasing the following updates in stages.

Additional areas, characters, skills, weapons, items, etc.
Beautiful graphics implemented in Unreal Engine 5 (currently UE4 version)
